highlights: Use Ruby on Rails to create a dashboard that displays information about the status of various supercomputer resources.
Write and publish various features and bug fixes for the OpenOndemand web app, a gateway enabling researchers to utilize the world's most powerful supercomputers.
Created the MongoDB database, Express.js API, and the connecting client code for Monkeytype.com, which is currently serving over 100k unique users every day.
Immediately reduced costs by 70 percent and slowed the rate of increasing cloud service costs.
Worked with the owner/lead developer and a more experienced professional to ensure a smooth deployment.

projects.name: Stem Player Online
projects.description: Created a web application that enables users to manipulate their music in a way similar to the popular Stem Player device created by Kanye West. Used by around 3000 people per month.

projects.name: 3cards
projects.description: Created a web3 application that allows users to create and share flashcard sets stored on the Arweave, a decentralized blockchain-like storage network. Winner in the Arweave Open Web Hackathon.

projects.name: mathgenerator
projects.description: Created and maintain an open-source python package that enables generating a wide variety of math problems. Package has 90 stars on Github and around 500 downloads per month.
Created a website where users can store, share, search, discuss, vote on, and manage their ideas.
projects.name: Ideaspot
Congol
projects.description: Created a website that allows users to play a version of Conway's Game of Life with 2 players competing live over the internet.

projects.name: Recolorbot
projects.description: Created a Reddit bot that colors black and white images using an AI image coloring API. Bot has colored images from over 100 posts.

projects.name: Flag Quiz
projects.description: Created a flutter app where users can test their knowledge of national flags.

projects.name: BeautifulVHS
projects.description: Created a website that displays a moving, 3d rendering of old vhs covers.

highlights: Work with team to plan weekly meetings and events, creating educational content for club members.
Lead efforts to acquire funding for the club and it's various events.
